item.title: Silab skillcape help plz
item.dc:creator: @rustyxcod rustyxcod
item.description:
@rustyxcod wrote:

Hi, a little while ago i saw a thread with the codes to put in ::silabcapes, and ::silabcapes2 and 3.

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“silabcapes”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
addItem(10704, 1);
addItem(10705, 1);
addItem(10706, 1);
addItem(10707, 1);
addItem(10708, 1);
addItem(10709, 1);

addItem(10720, 1);
addItem(10721, 1);
addItem(10722, 1);
addItem(10723, 1);
addItem(10724, 1);

addItem(10726, 1);
addItem(10727, 1);
addItem(10728, 1);
addItem(10729, 1);
addItem(10730, 1);
addItem(10731, 1);

		}[/code]

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“silabcapes2”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
addItem(10732, 1);
addItem(10733, 1);
addItem(10734, 1);

addItem(10755, 1);
addItem(10756, 1);
addItem(10757, 1);
addItem(10758, 1);
addItem(10759, 1);

		}[/code]

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“silabcapes3”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
addItem(10760, 1);
addItem(10761, 1);
addItem(10762, 1);
addItem(10763, 1);
addItem(10764, 1);
addItem(10765, 1);

addItem(10771, 1);
addItem(10865, 1);
addItem(10866, 1);
addItem(10867, 1);

		}[/code]

Ok, so, i get how those work but… is there a way to make a command for each cape set? and make it so u have to have 99 of the skill to get it? then they would actually be real skill capes, not just capes with cool emotes that anyone can get. Or is there a way to make it so u have to have at least 99 of a skill to wear it.

I wanted to try to get this idea on my server to actually give people a challenge of getting the capes, also for some people to brag like in real runescape when that have something special.

Any help or helpful comments would be appreciated.

Also any links to tuts or codes would help too. ;D
